entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor component lifecycle and state management. #42758
  • Revise `RenderTreeBuilderAnalyzer` requirement to force "literal" sequence parameters #42756
  • App fails to process request and returns 503/404 when URL has more than 1 slash #42751

Closed

  • SoundPlayer: Add functions to start playing at Timestamp. #42759
  • Support multiple issuers in JwtBearerConfigureOptions #42000
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup AspNetCoreAnalyzers #42757
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Correct a typo in the code comment #42753
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Support loading OIDC options from configuration #42679
    area-security, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • refactor : use new `ThrowIf` overload of `ObjectDisposedException` #42613
    area-blazor, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [draft] JavaScript interop via [JSImport] and [JSExport] #41665
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
